org.lindbergframework.persistence
Interface PersistenceTemplate

All Known Implementing Classes:
LinpTemplate, TemplateBase
public interface PersistenceTemplate

interface that defines the persistente template contract.

Author:
Victor Lindberg

execQuery

<E> java.util.List<E> execQuery(java.lang.Class<E> clazz,
                                java.lang.String sqlId,
                                java.lang.Object... params)
Executes a sql command for query.

Parameters:
clazz - bean type expected for result mapping.
sqlId - sql command id for query.
params - arguments for query.
Returns:
list with bean instances populated of clazz argument type.
See Also:
BeanPopulator, MultiLevelsBeanPopulator

Parameters:
clazz - bean type expected for result mapping.

params - arguments for query.
Returns:
bean instance populated of clazz argument type or null if the result is empty.

callProcedure

java.util.Map callProcedure(java.lang.String sqlId,
                            SqlArg... args)
Call a sql command for a stored procedure.

Parameters:
sqlId - sql command id for stored procedure.
args - 'in' procedure arguments.
Returns:
a map with out procedure parameters with the parameter name as key and the parameter value as map value.

callFunction

java.util.Map callFunction(java.lang.String sqlId,
                           SqlArg... args)
Call a sql command for a stored function.

Parameters:
sqlId - sql command id for stored function.
args - 'in' function arguments.
Returns:
a map with out function parameters with the parameter name as key and the parameter value as map value. The default function result object key in result map is SqlFunction.DEFAULT_RESULT_NAME constant.
